snippet: Masahiro Tanaka’s quest to return is more about determining whether he will be available in 2015 than it is about helping the Yankees’ faint postseason hopes.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka’s quest to return is more about determining whether he will be available in 2015 than it is about helping the Yankees’ faint postseason hopes.

headline.main: Tanaka Could Make a Return Before Season Ends
headline.print_headline: Tanaka Could Make a Return Before Season Ends
